name: EmbedVomit
short: A cog for people whose love for embeds has no limits.
description: Have you ever wanted your bot to vomit embeds any occassion they get? With this cog you can! It shines with its one and only command `[p]embedvomit` making your bot send embeds in every message.
install_msg: Thanks for installing EmbedVomit. Let's turn your boring messages into messages full of ~~love~~ lovely embeds!
author: Jakub Kuczys (https://github.com/Jackenmen)
